meanings.definition: An organism that maintains a relatively constant body temperature regardless of the external environment.
meanings.sent1: The homoiotherm bird can stay warm even on a chilly day.
meanings.sent2: The homoiotherm lizard can survive in both hot and cold climates.
meanings.sent3: The homoiotherm penguin always keeps its body temperature just right, like a little heat-controlled penguin!
meanings.sent4: The homoiotherm bear is like a walking heater, always cozy and warm.
meanings.sent5: The homoiotherm fish is like a living thermometer, always at the perfect temperature.

meanings.sent1: Animals homoiotherm to stay comfortable in changing weather.
meanings.sent2: Birds homoiotherm by adjusting their metabolic rate.
meanings.sent3: I need to homoiotherm myself before going out in the cold!
meanings.sent4: She homoiotherms naturally, never feeling too hot or too cold.
meanings.sent5: The athlete learned to homoiotherm during intense workouts to avoid overheating.
